<Grid>
  {/* If you need additional control over height of your grid, or need to add SubGrids, you can add your own GridInner components. */}

    <GridCell span={4}>
      <GridInner>
        <GridCell span={4}>a</GridCell>
        <GridCell span={4}>b</GridCell>
        <GridCell span={4}>c</GridCell>
      </GridInner>
    </GridCell>
  </GridInner>
</Grid>
